Title: Volunteer QA Junior Testers Wanted for Exciting Startup (Flexible Schedule)
Job Description:
Hello aspiring QA Testers!


Metkagram, an innovative startup working on an exceptional web and Android application, is seeking passionate and dedicated QA Junior Testers to join our team as volunteers. We might not be able to offer financial compensation at this time, but we believe in recognizing and rewarding your hard work and commitment, and we're pleased to offer a flexible schedule to accommodate your availability.


What's in it for you?

  • A valuable experience of working in a fast-paced startup environment
  • A chance to learn and apply industry-standard QA testing methodologies
  • An opportunity to hone your testing and analytical skills
  • A strong recommendation letter and/or LinkedIn recommendation from Us
  • Your name listed as a team member on our website, showcasing your contribution to the project
  • A flexible schedule to work around your other commitments


Responsibilities:

  • Perform manual testing of our web and Android application, ensuring a seamless user experience
  • Identify, document, and report any bugs or inconsistencies found during testing
  • Collaborate with our development team to reproduce and resolve issues
  • Participate in regular meetings to provide updates on testing progress and insights
  • Provide suggestions for improvements based on your testing experience


Requirements:

  • No prior QA testing experience is required; we welcome those looking to gain experience in the field
  • A keen eye for detail and a strong ability to identify inconsistencies and errors
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team
  • A self-starter attitude and the ability to work independently
  • Access to an Android device for testing purposes (preferred, but not mandatory)
Required Skills: Web Applications | Mobile Applications | Quality Assurance | Flutter

Title: Volunteer UI/UX Designers Wanted for Exciting Startup (Flexible Schedule)
Job Description:
Hello aspiring UI/UX Designers!


Metkagram, an innovative startup working on an exceptional web and Android application, is seeking passionate and dedicated UI/UX Designers to join our team as volunteers. We might not be able to offer financial compensation at this time, but we believe in recognizing and rewarding your hard work and commitment, and we're pleased to offer a flexible schedule to accommodate your availability.


What's in it for you?

  • A valuable experience of working in a startup environment
  • A chance to contribute to the design and usability of an innovative application
  • An opportunity to enhance your UI/UX design mindset
  • A strong recommendation letter and/or LinkedIn recommendation from Us
  • Your name listed as a team member on our website, showcasing your contribution to the project
  • A flexible schedule to work around your other commitments


Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with our product and development team to create visually appealing and user-friendly designs
  • Develop wireframes, prototypes, and mockups for our web and Android application


Requirements:

  • No prior UI/UX design experience is required; we welcome those looking to gain experience in the field
  • A strong interest in UI/UX design principles and best practices
  • A self-starter attitude and the ability to work independently
Required Skills: User Experience (UX) | User Interface Design | Flutter
